code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import userReducer from'./User/UserReducer';import cartReducer from'./Cart/CartReducer';import directoryReducer from'./Directory/DirectoryReducer';import shopReducer from'./Shop/ShopReducer';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
